content: Just landed in NYC and the vibe is insane, like the city's wrapping me in a hug with its skyline. First thing, hitting up my old spots to see what's new in the quant trading game.

content: Just had coffee with my old mentor and we started brainstorming. What if we used reinforcement learning to adapt trading strategies on-the-fly? Sounds like a project to dive into this weekend. Time to hit the code!

content: Just applied for a quant role at this cool boutique firm. They want me to present a trading strategy, so I'm tweaking my algo to beat the S&P 500 from the past 6 months. Wish me luck!
